ideal_referral: Manufacturing & Assembly SMEs Wholesale Distributors & Traders Consultants & Advisors Chartered Accountant (CA) or Business Coach specializing in Manufacturing SMEs
top_problem_solved: Inventory Leakage & Pilferage The Pain: Manufacturers buying raw materials but getting less finished output due to undocumented wastage or theft on the factory floor. The Fix: We implement digital "Checkpoints" that track material movement, flagging variances instantly. Operational Blindness The Pain: Business owners making decisions based on gut feeling because their data is trapped in disconnected Excel sheets and Tally, leading to cash flow crunches. The Fix: We build a "Digital Brain" that aggregates data into one dashboard, allowing decisions based on real-time facts. Sales Process Fragmentation The Pain: Leads and orders getting lost in WhatsApp chats or notebooks, resulting in missed revenue and lack of accountability for sales staff. The Fix: We centralize all communication and order-taking into one mobile-friendly system that the owner controls.
